name: An Architect's Adventure
description:
Explore islands, build shapes, Conquer the puzzles.
This is a 3D Sokoban puzzle game.Adjacent blocks are connected together. You need to construct the structure required for each level through whimsy to pass the level.
Features:
-About 130 hand-craft puzzles.
-Each time you pass a level, a block will be generated on the big map, allowing you to build a bridge to reach new level areas.
-Conciseness is maintained.

Join my discord: https://discord.gg/Yp5cNbmpkJ
